div.a: PRSD Covid-19 School Closure Plan revised3-20-20

p.a: Port Republic School Schedule and closing information

div.class: post-1760 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized

div.p:
We hope everyone enjoyed their break!
Reminder: Tomorrow, April 15th, we will return to “schooling at home” with a single session day. The building will remain closed by order of the governor.
